sentence.text: Clinical interaction studies with cimetidine and warfarin indicated that the coadministration of Femara with these drugs does not result in clinically- significant drug interactions.
sentence.negationtags: Clinical interaction studies with cimetidine and warfarin indicated that the coadministration of Femara with these drugs does <scope> <cue> not </cue> result in clinically- significant drug interactions. </scope>

sentence.text: (See CLINICAL PHARMACOLOGY) Coadministration of Femara and tamoxifen 20 mg daily resulted in a reduction of letrozole plasma levels by 38% on average.
There is no clinical experience to date on the use of Femara in combination with other anticancer agents.
sentence.negationtags: There is <scope> <cue> no </cue> clinical experience to date on the use of Femara in combination with other anticancer agents. </scope>
